overview: The life of ants under the ground and the life that the Palestinian people live under the ground, are similar in caves and catacombs that reach the cities of Palestine under the barriers set by the Israeli enemy, so that communication between cities takes place without trouble, and through these catacombs and caves are stories and witnesses of successive civilizations on this land, like a journey between The outward appearance of the earth and its interior, between the bitter reality and the myth.
title: Kingdom of Ants
